org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

接口 ReplicationService

  • 所有已知子接口:
    ReplicationSinkService, ReplicationSourceService

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ReplicationService
    Gateway to Cluster Replication. Used by HRegionServer. One such application is a cross-datacenter replication service that can keep two hbase clusters in sync.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Initializes the replication service object.
      org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.regionserver.ReplicationLoad refreshAndGetReplicationLoad()
      Refresh and Get ReplicationLoad
      void startReplicationService()
      Start replication services.
      void stopReplicationService()
      Stops replication service.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        void initialize(Server rs,
                org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path logdir,
                org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path oldLogDir,
                WALProvider walProvider)
         throws IOException
        Initializes the replication service object.
        参数:
        walProvider - can be null if not initialized inside a live region server environment, for example, ReplicationSyncUp.
        抛出:
        IOException
